import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import './Signup.css' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Signup() { const [Dados, setDados] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:3333/signup').then(response => { setDados(response.data) }) }, []) const [campos, setCampos] = useState({ Name: '', Email: '', Password: '', }) function handleInputChange(event) { campos[event.target.name] = event.target.value setCampos(campos) } function handleFormSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:3333/signup', campos) .then(response => { alert(response.data.dados.length + 'cadastros') }) } return (
